creator: jimsonchang@yahoo.com
text:
hai,
I just built the CHM formatted Apache Directive
Documentation, hopefully, Apache people can put a link
to
http://www.geocities.com/jimsonchang/apache_manual.zip
so that other people can also enjoy the easy navigate
apache documentation.


happy new year 2003!

sincerely,
Jimson Chang

It seems very hard to get contact with Apache
people...!

creator: wrowe@apache.org
text:
Jimson ... you might want to subscribe to docs@httpd.apache.org (by sending
  blank email to docs-subscribe@httpd.apache.org)  That is where all of the
  documentation and translation discussions happen.

Yes.  We appreciate your contribution, but what we really need to have a system
for updating the chm file and distributing it.  There has been some work
in this regard already for httpd-2.0, but not many people are working on 
improving the 1.3 documentation anymore.

Anyway, I second Bill's invitiation to come discuss this on the documentation
list, and I'll close this report, because the bug database is not a good
place for this discussion.
creator: slive@apache.org
